mapper.select: select g.id as id,g.comment_type as comment_type,g.content as content,g.good_id as good_id, g.associator_name as associator_name,g.associator_id as associator_id, g.create_time as create_time,img.id as gid,img.img_url as img_url FROM (select *from t_good_comment where good_id=#{evaluateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit #{offSet},#{pageSize}) as g LEFT JOIN t_good_comment_img as img on img.comment_id=g.id
select COUNT(id) from t_good_comment where good_id = #{evaluateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select r.id as id,r.comment_type as comment_type,r.recipe_id as good_id, r.content as content,r.associator_name as associator_name,r.associator_id as associator_id, r.create_time as create_time,img.id as gid,img.img_url as img_url from (select *from t_recipe_comment where recipe_id=#{evaluateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit #{offSet},#{pageSize}) as r LEFT JOIN t_recipe_comment_img as img on img.comment_id=r.id ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
select COUNT(id) from t_recipe_comment where recipe_id = #{evaluateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
